content.rendered:
Surcharge

Reduce fees with
credit card surcharging.

Thanks to Dynamic Merchant Solutions, you can embrace the ability to surcharge on credit card payments today.
Free Quote
Contact Sales

Keep 100% of every credit card sale you make with surcharge payment options. You only pay when customers use debit cards— it's that simple.

Enjoy full compliance with surcharges that are only added to eligible transactions.

Contact Sales

Add surcharges on creditcard payments with 100% compliance.

Credit card surcharging.

As a surcharge payment service company in Los Angeles, we help you address convenience, compliance, and security when customers pay with credit cards.

Add surcharges anywhere you accept payments. In-person, online, over the phone, and even on virtual terminals. Dynamic Merchant Solutions' technology supports them all.

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
No hidden fees
24/7 customer services
In-Person (Average)
1.92%+8¢
Average PIN-Debit Rate 0.91% +8¢

Keyed & Online (Average)

2.38%+25¢

What Our Clients Say
About Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

We’re a leading merchant services company in Los Angeles

Maria Mak

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Mikaela Stone

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Chris Mathew

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Start Selling with

Dynamic Merchant
Solutions.

Request a free quote from a top merchant payment
service in Los Angeles.

Apply now and get
approved as soon as 24
hours.
